casebody.data:
HOWELL
v.
N.C. WAYNE COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, et al. No. 326P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Burl Anderson Howell, La Grange, for Howell, Burl Anderson. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Wayne County Department of Health and Human Services, et al. E.B. Borden Parker, Goldsboro, for N.C. Wayne County Department of Health and Human Services, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of September 2015 by Petitioner-Appellant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
